short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Two Bits is a browser extension that acts as your personal assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with Two Bits, a powerful browser extension designed to make web content more accessible and manageable. With Three key features – "View Summary," "Send via Email," and "Summarize Selected Text" – Two Bits empowers you to quickly grasp, save, and share information effortlessly.

View Summary: Uncover the essence of lengthy articles with ease. Right-click on any blog or text-based page, and select "View Summary" to receive a concise summary, enabling you to understand the main points without the need to read through the entire content.

Send via Email: Seamlessly save valuable summaries for future reference. Utilize the "Send via Email" feature to instantly deliver summarized content to your registered email address, ensuring important information is always at your fingertips.

Summarize Selected Text: Efficiently distill key information from any text. By selecting specific content and choosing "Summarize Selected Text," Two Bits generates a summary of the highlighted material, helping you capture insights swiftly.

Enhance your browsing journey with Two Bits – your personal assistant for smarter content consumption.

Install the Two Bits browser extension today and transform the way you engage with online information.
